duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in implementing SharePoint, MS Teams, and Power Apps, and integrating these technologies into current business processes.
Advise on the creation and enforcement of governance policies.
Develop MS Teams templates and request necessary functionality within the technologies.
Assist end users in developing solutions that utilize Teams and SharePoint using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI.
Provide first level support for Teams users at the agency.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Microsoft SharePoint and Microsoft Teams
